fire@start.name: fire
fire@start.examine:
In the fire you see faint images of the ghosts of dead players.  The sparkles
fly up and away, disappearing amongst the pillars of the temple.
fire@start.desc[0]: A roaring fire burns here.  Its flames make the temple sparkle and glitter.

newbiecloak@start.name: newbiecloak
newbiecloak@start.examine: It has been especially designed for new players.
newbiecloak@start.desc[0]: A long &+mcloak&* for new players is here.

newbieboots@start.name: newbieboots
newbieboots@start.examine: It has been specially designed for new players.
newbieboots@start.desc[0]: A pair of new hiking &+mboots&* for new players is here.

donation_pit@start.name: Donation_Pit
donation_pit@start.desc[0]:
At your feet a huge sacrifical pit allows you to give valuables
to the gods in the hope of being rewarded.

church_pit@start.name: Church_Pit
church_pit@start.desc[0]:
At your feet a huge sacrificial pit allows you to give valuables to the gods
in the hope of being rewarded.

umbrella@start.name: Umbrella
umbrella@start.examine:
It is a large, black umbrella, somewhat battered.  The initials 'M.Poppins'
are engraved on the handle.

newbiemace@start.name: newbiemace
newbiemace@start.examine: It has been specially designed for new players.
newbiemace@start.desc[0]: A large &+mmace&* for new players is here.

newbiesword@start.name: newbiesword
newbiesword@start.examine: Is has been specially designed for new players.
newbiesword@start.desc[0]: A &+msword&* for new players is here.

pit@start.name: pit
pit@start.desc[0]:
At your feet a huge sacrificial pit allows you to give valuables to the gods
in the hope of being rewarded.

donate_pit_sun@start.name: Donate_Pit_Sun
donate_pit_sun@start.desc[0]:
At your feet a huge sacrifical pit allows you to give valuables
to the gods in the hope of being rewarded.

newbieaxe@start.name: newbieaxe
newbieaxe@start.examine: It has been specially designed for new players.
newbieaxe@start.desc[0]: A large battle &+maxe&* for new players is here.

newbieshield@start.name: newbieshield
newbieshield@start.examine: It has been especially designed for new players.
newbieshield@start.desc[0]: A &+mshield&* for new players is here.

between@start.title: Between Worlds
between@start.description:
You stand in a void, between several different worlds of the Promised
Land.  Here you decide, which part of the world you wish to visit first...you
see portals to the always familiar Temple of Paradise and Village Church. 
You also see portals to a council chamber, an inn, and an altar.  There is 
also a portal to the Promised Land Welcome Center.

donation@start.title: The Donations Room
donation@start.description:
This room is full of things that players before you were thoughtful
enough to donate.  Items found in this room are as good as they
normally are, and have the same properties, but they aren't worth any
points.  There are exits west and south from here.  Upstairs is the
entrance to the Welcome Centre.

church@start.title: The Village Church
church@start.description:
You are in the village's small wooden church.  A gentle breeze blows into
the church disturbing the dust which dances in the sunbeams that shine faintly
through the windows.  A doorway leads south.

donate_sun@start.title: Chamber of Charity
donate_sun@start.description:
This room is full of things that players before you were thoughtful
enough to donate.  Items found in this room are as good as they
normally are, and have the same properties, but they aren't worth any
points.  Players can change their personnas here.

temple@start.title: The Temple Of Paradise
temple@start.description:
You stand in the Temple of Paradise, a huge stone structure whose walls are
decorated with ancient carvings and runes, some so old that even the priests no
longer know their meanings.
   A single set of steps lead south, descending the huge mound upon which the
temple is built and ending in the forests below.

donate_bal@start.title: The Store Room
donate_bal@start.description:
This room is full of things that players before you were thoughtful
enough to donate.  Items found in this room are as good as they
normally are, and have the same properties, but they aren't worth any
points.  Players can change their personnas here.

bob@start.name: Bob
bob@start.description: Bob is here, looking eager to answer your questions.

puff@start.name: puff
puff@start.description: Puff The Fractal Dragon is here with a faraway look in her eyes.
